channel.title: -- Maatt's Int Renamer --
channel.description:
My name is Maatt on another forum which I will not post on here, if you don't believe me I can post a screen shot. ------------------------------- This is a WIP(Work in Progress).
Maatt's Int Renamer v0.1
:: v0.1 ::
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2wncs29.png[/img]
:: v1.0 ::
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2jax647.png[/img]
Includes:
Loading Ints from file. Saving Ints to file. Cut, Copy, Paste, New/Clear, Select All. Toolbar. (Hideable/Showable under 'Other' tab) Renaming. (Items, Objects, Interfaces, NPCs) Non2Renamed List. Custom Rename. Colour/Font changing.
v1.0 Includes: Saving Ints to file. Cut, Copy, Paste, New/Clear, Select All. Toolbar. (Hideable/Showable under 'Other' tab) Custom Rename. Colour/Font changing. 1 Rename Button Renaming GFX! Printing. New 'Custom Rename' Interface. Text Saying. FullScreen. (Everything Docks with it.) Removed Individual Renaming
v1.2 Includes: Saving Ints to file. Cut, Copy, Paste, New/Clear, Select All. Toolbar. (Hideable/Showable under 'Other' tab) Custom Rename. Colour/Font changing. 1 Rename Button. Renaming GFX! Printing. New 'Custom Rename' Interface. Text Saying. FullScreen. (Everything Docks with it.) Removed Individual Renaming Themes. (Tan (Default), Green, Red, Blue, Yellow, Purple) -- IF YOU WANT MORE COLORS POST! -- Un-Rename Button. Cleaned up coding a bit. Links to MoparScape forums and another forum. (Not saying other forum link)
v1.3 Will Include: Saving Ints to file. Cut, Copy, Paste, New/Clear, Select All. Toolbar. (Hideable/Showable under 'Other' tab) Custom Rename. Colour/Font changing. 1 Rename Button. Renaming GFX! Printing. New 'Custom Rename' Interface. Text Saying. FullScreen. (Everything Docks with it.) Removed Individual Renaming Themes. (Tan (Default), Green, Red, Blue, Yellow, Purple) -- IF YOU WANT MORE COLORS POST! -- Un-Rename Button. Links to MoparScape forums and another forum. (Not saying other forum link) Renaming for BS (BattleScape) clients or clients based off of BS.
Progress: (v1.3 BETA) ▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓ 70%
Download:
v0.1: Lost file. (New Computer, if anyone off of the other forum got it I'll ask for them to upload.) v1.0: Uppit - [url=http://uppit.com/v/P0OMNFG8]Click to Download[/url] v1.2: Uploading.. v1.3: Still in progress..
Post any bugs here or at icecreamcoder@live.com
